SKY SHADOW looked around as did the FUZORS, =93Hydras is=
 missing,
Cryotek is missing.=94 He frowned as he looked up to see the flam=

does not bode well for us.=94

er he wanted to
call himself, but I haven=92t seen him  since.=94

There wa=

dacons Retreat!!!" SKYSHADOW sent across the radio along

els. "Report back to base!"

 ash streaking

tion

<NEW>

As TUSCON tried to fly over and protect RODIMUS it is quickly =
evident
that RODIMUS was much larger than he had been before! He was no
ord=
inary sparrow or hawk but he was a giant phoenix with flamed
slowing off of=

claws where he held th=
e smaller form of NIGHTLIGHT was cool and dark.
Also the soot and debris th=
at were falling seemed to be doing little
to RODIMUS as they quickly turned=
 to ash and char when his flames hit
them.

They both were flying above and=
 yet away from the Volcano.

=93I do not think a simple rain will stop this=
 volcano.=94 RODIMUS said
his voice somehow wiser and deeper than it had be=
en before. =93It is
purging itself of a dark menace.=94

Even as RODIMUS sp=
oke dark magma began to flow from the mountain.

=93Come, we must get the r=
est of the Maximals to safety.=94 RODIMUS flew
towards the others as the sk=
ies continued to darken and the ground
began to turn black as it rained ash=
 and fire. "We can do nothing but
try to heal and get everyone away from he=
re."

With the ash falling and small burning bits of fire and brimstone,
pl=
us the Magma flows this area will be dangerous until the volcano
fueled sto=
rm abates. Smoke was begining to rise from the ground as

 and burned.
